page.title: 05All Saints CE Primary School
page.content: The School is a Church of England Voluntary Aided Primary School situated in Great Ryburgh with an Infant Annexe in Stibbard. The roll is 114, and the children come from the parishes of Great and Little Ryburgh, Gateley, Stibbard, Wood Norton, Guist and Twyford. In 1979 the school was established as a{"cluster" school under one Headteacher as a possible alternative to the closure of small village schools. All 8-11 year olds from the 7 parishes were bussed to Great Ryburgh. The 5-7 year olds remained in Annexes at Guist and Stibbard to be educated close to home. Great Ryburgh also had its own Infant class. Guist Annexe closed in July 1983 and the children transferred to Stibbard. Ryburgh Infants had already moved to Stibbard due to staff cutbacks in September 1981.
